com.ixopay.client.signing.model

Class HttpRequestInfo.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ixopay.client.signing.model.HttpRequestInfo.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    HttpRequestInfo

    public static class HttpRequestInfo.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper to correctly construct HttpRequestInfo objects.

        public HttpRequestInfo.Builder withBody(byte[] body)

        Returns:

        Throws:
